name: Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui "Oboro"
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your ride phase, choose up to one card from your opponent's drop, your opponent calls that card to (RC), and at the end of that turn, retires that unit.Dominate -[AUTO](VC):When your G unit [Stride], choose up to one of your opponent's rear-guards, [Stand] and dominate it, until end of turn, it gets [Power] +4000, and attacks your opponent's other unit.
flavor: The dragon of the demon eye is said to preach the laws of the dominator on moonlit nights.

name: Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui "Oboro"
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your ride phase, choose up to one card from your opponent's drop, your opponent calls that card to (RC), and at the end of that turn, retires that unit.Dominate -[AUTO](VC):When your G unit [Stride], choose up to one of your opponent's rear-guards, [Stand] and dominate it, until end of turn, it gets [Power] +4000, and attacks your opponent's other unit.
flavor: The dragon of the demon eye is said to preach the laws of the dominator on moonlit nights.

name: Stealth Dragon, Genkai
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 3 with "Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui " in its card name, you may call this card to (RC). If you called a card, [Soul-Charge 1], choose up to one unit card from your opponent's drop, and your opponent calls that card to (RC).[AUTO](RC):When a unit dominated by you attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and that attacking unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle. This unit gets "Boost" until end of turn.
flavor: The weak shall perish. Hence, the dragon pursued power.

name: Stealth Dragon, Genkai
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 3 with "Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui " in its card name, you may call this card to (RC). If you called a card, [Soul-Charge 1], choose up to one unit card from your opponent's drop, and your opponent calls that card to (RC).[AUTO](RC):When a unit dominated by you attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and that attacking unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle. This unit gets "Boost" until end of turn.
flavor: The weak shall perish. Hence, the dragon pursued power.

name: Stealth Dragon, Seizui
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from "Stealth Dragon, Madoi", draw a card, and you get a "Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui "Oboro"" crest.
flavor: The lamentation of disappointment lit the dark flame within the dragon's heart.

name: Stealth Dragon, Madoi
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor:
The unraveled flame burns with the bloodied winds on the battlefield sunken in darkness.
This is the tale of the stealth operatives known as the "Shiranui".

name: Stealth Dragon, Shiranui
effect: [CONT](RC)[Generation Break 2]:If a unit dominated by you attacked this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000. [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand while paying the cost for [Stride], draw a card.
flavor:
"External laws are still laws"...
It is said that the third eye that shines on its forehead originates from the great tengu of ancient times.

name: Stealth Dragon, Shiranui
effect: [CONT](RC)[Generation Break 2]:If a unit dominated by you attacked this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000. [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand while paying the cost for [Stride], draw a card.
flavor:
"External laws are still laws"...
It is said that the third eye that shines on its forehead originates from the great tengu of ancient times.

name: Stealth Dragon, Sekiei
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard attacks, if a unit dominated by you attacked this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], [Stand] this unit, if your G zone has two or more face up cards, draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: This is a place of carnage. There is no time to grieve.

name: Stealth Dragon, Sekiei
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard attacks, if a unit dominated by you attacked this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], [Stand] this unit, if your G zone has two or more face up cards, draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: This is a place of carnage. There is no time to grieve.

name: Stealth Dragon, Fuurai
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit gets [Power] +5000 for each time a unit dominated by you attacked this turn.[AUTO](RC)[Generation Break 1]:When your vanguard attacks, if a unit dominated by you attacked this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit.
flavor: It is said that resistance is futile before those eyes.

name: Stealth Dragon, Fuurai
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit gets [Power] +5000 for each time a unit dominated by you attacked this turn.[AUTO](RC)[Generation Break 1]:When your vanguard attacks, if a unit dominated by you attacked this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit.
flavor: It is said that resistance is futile before those eyes.

name: Stealth Dragon, Utsuroi
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel （You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck）[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from hand, and discard it.
flavor: These blade-shattering chains shall chain down the will to counterattack.

name: Stealth Dragon, Utsuroi
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel （You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck）[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from hand, and discard it.
flavor: These blade-shattering chains shall chain down the will to counterattack.

name: Stealth Beast, Katarigitsune
effect: [CONT](Hand):While you are paying the cost for [Stride], this card may be discarded as a grade 3. [ACT](Hand):If you have a "Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui "Oboro"" crest, [COST][discard this card], search your deck or drop for up to one grade 3 card with "Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui" in its card name, reveal it and put it into hand, and if you searched the deck, shuffle the deck.
flavor: According to the fox, darkness is the legacy of the demon dragon.

name: Stealth Beast, Katarigitsune
effect: [CONT](Hand):While you are paying the cost for [Stride], this card may be discarded as a grade 3. [ACT](Hand):If you have a "Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui "Oboro"" crest, [COST][discard this card], search your deck or drop for up to one grade 3 card with "Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui" in its card name, reveal it and put it into hand, and if you searched the deck, shuffle the deck.
flavor: According to the fox, darkness is the legacy of the demon dragon.

name: Stealth Dragon, Zankei
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit gets [Power] +5000 for each time an attack by a unit dominated by you hit this turn.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn][Generation Break 1]:When your unit's attack hits, [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: Not missing any opportunities, the blade of deprivation swiftly moves towards the neck.

name: Stealth Dragon, Zankei
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit gets [Power] +5000 for each time an attack by a unit dominated by you hit this turn.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn][Generation Break 1]:When your unit's attack hits, [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: Not missing any opportunities, the blade of deprivation swiftly moves towards the neck.

name: Stealth Dragon, Tenrei
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a "Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui "Oboro"" crest, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card. [AUTO](RC):When the attack by a unit dominated by you hits, you may return this unit to hand.
flavor: It is said that with the ominous powers, breathens became sworn enemies.

name: Stealth Dragon, Tenrei
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a "Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui "Oboro"" crest, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card. [AUTO](RC):When the attack by a unit dominated by you hits, you may return this unit to hand.
flavor: It is said that with the ominous powers, breathens became sworn enemies.

name: Dragon Deity King of Resurgence, Dragveda
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - Choose one of your vanguards, and [Stand] it!
flavor: The fleeting but surely burning flames of Shiranui are a beacon that leads to the way towards the future.

name: Stealth Dragon, Madowazu
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: A dispassionate blade that buries its enemies without hesitation.

name: Stealth Dragon, Midaregumo
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, draw a card! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: Drown into the clouds, and sink to death.

name: Stealth Dragon, Yamitaguri
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: Bwoom.

name: Stealth Dragon, Shikintan
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn! Then, if the number of cards in your damage zone is equal to or more than your opponent's, choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it!)
flavor: The secret medicine of the village removes wounds, pain... even fear.

name: Evil-eye Hades Emperor, Shiranui "Mukuro"
effect: (This card cannot be in your main deck)[Stride]-Stride Step-[COST][Discard a grade 3 card with "Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui" in its card name from hand], and [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down. (When you stride, your original vanguard becomes a heart card, and this unit gets that card's [Power] and card name. At the end of the turn, return this unit face up)Dominate -[ACT](VC)[1/turn][Generation Break 2]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, [Stand] and dominate it, and it attacks your opponent's vanguard. At the end of that battle, [Stand] and dominate all of your opponent's vanguards, and they attack your opponent's rear-guard. (Once one of the battles ends, the next battle begins. Perform drive checks with your own deck)
flavor: A life after overcoming countless wreckages. The dragon with the evil eye went towards the land of death.

name: Evil-eye Hades Emperor, Shiranui "Mukuro"
effect: [Stride]-Stride Step-[COST][Discard a grade 3 card with "Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui" in its card name from hand], and [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.Dominate -[ACT](VC)[1/turn][Generation Break 2]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, [Stand] and dominate it, and it attacks your opponent's vanguard. At the end of that battle, [Stand] and dominate all of your opponent's vanguards, and they attack one of your opponent's rear-guards.

name: Enma Stealth Dragon, Maguntenbu
effect: (This card cannot be in your main deck)[Stride]-Stride Step-[COST][Choose one or more cards from hand with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater, and discard them], and [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down. (When you stride, your original vanguard becomes a heart card, and this unit gets that card's [Power] and card name. At the end of the turn, return this unit face up)Dominate -[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & turn a card from G zone face up], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, [Stand] and dominate it, it attacks your opponent's other unit, and retire that dominated unit at the end of that battle.
flavor: That is the power that can twist and control the will of others.

name: Enma Stealth Dragon, Maguntenbu
effect: [Stride]-Stride Step-[COST][Choose one or more cards from hand with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater, and discard them], and [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.Dominate -[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & turn a card from G zone face up], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, [Stand] and dominate it, it attacks your opponent's other unit, and retire that dominated unit at the end of that battle.

name: Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui "Oboro"
effect: [CONT]:You can perform [Stride], and cannot ride grade 3 or greater cards without "Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui" in their card names.[CONT]:The original [Power] of your grade 3 cards with "Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui" in their card names become 13000. (Including heart cards)[CONT]:During your turn, if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui" in its card name, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 for each face up card in your G zone. (The [Power] of dominated units will not increase)[CONT]:During your turn, your opponent's units placed by your card's ability this turn, and units dominated by you, lose all of their [CONT] and [AUTO] abilities, and get [Power] +5000.

name: Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui "Oboro"
effect: [CONT]:You can perform [Stride], and cannot ride grade 3 or greater cards without "Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui" in their card names.[CONT]:The original [Power] of your grade 3 cards with "Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui" in their card names become 13000.[CONT]:During your turn, if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui" in its card name, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 for each face up card in your G zone.
